*üëâ Changelog*



<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/compare/v2.17.3...v2.17.4|compare changes>



*ü©π Fixes*



‚Ä¢   ‚Äã*types:*‚Äã Bump `serve-static` types to v1.15.7 (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/1c44c376d|1c44c376d>)

‚Ä¢   ‚Äã*generator:*‚Äã Use maintained `html-minifier-terser` (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/26914|#26914>)

‚Ä¢   ‚Äã*vue-app:*‚Äã Prevent double page mount (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/10874|#10874>)

‚Ä¢   ‚Äã*core:*‚Äã Don't skip loading runtime modules if one is improperly resolved (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/10193|#10193>)

‚Ä¢   ‚Äã*vue-app:*‚Äã Prevent error page mounting twice (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/27484|#27484>)



*üè° Chore*



‚Ä¢   Update repository field for `@nuxt/config` (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/c283cc039|c283cc039>)

‚Ä¢   Mark <https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2p57-rm9w-gvfp|https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2p57-rm9w-gvfp> as not applicable (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/4782e3c90|4782e3c90>)

‚Ä¢   Update repository urls (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/07668eafb|07668eafb>)

‚Ä¢   Mark GHSA-grv7-fg5c-xmjg as not applicable (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/eeb6207c9|eeb6207c9>)

‚Ä¢   Refresh yarn lockfile (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/27612|#27612>)



*‚úÖ Tests*



‚Ä¢   Properly close `page` in e2e tests (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/1700aa131|1700aa131>)

‚Ä¢   Wait for navigation in redirect test (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/e74715606|e74715606>)

‚Ä¢   Don't register promise in external nav (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/27468|#27468>)



*ü§ñ CI*



‚Ä¢   Add label PR workflow (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/pull/25580|#25580>)

‚Ä¢   Make edge releases on commit basis (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/1eb08d1ba|1eb08d1ba>)

‚Ä¢   Remove ref for release workflows (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/06f91349f|06f91349f>)

‚Ä¢   Don't skip tests from branch named `dev` (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/2a5d05257|2a5d05257>)

‚Ä¢   Update test conditions (<https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/commit/940fc7dcb|940fc7dcb>)
